title: Ice Cream Kitty
description: When the back door is accidentally left open, little Tommy ventures outside. He wanders away from home and gets lost. He is rescued by Dan, the Ice Cream Man. Will Tommy ever be reunited with his family or will he stay with Dan? Find out what happens in this delightful children's storybook. Children will also enjoy the fun activities at the end of this book. Included are a color by number, maze and more.
author: Nerina DiBenedetto
